<span data-ttu-id="2d3bd-103">Da biste videli zaglavlja i druge detalje na e-mail, izaberite tri tačke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2d3bd-103">To see the headers and other details in an email, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="2d3bd-104">u gornjem uglu okna za čitanje i izaberite **Prikaz izvor poruke**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2d3bd-104">at the top corner of the reading pane and select **View message source**.</span></span>
